mapper.select: SELECT treeid, parent_id AS parentId, node_name AS nodeName, node_type AS nodeType, factor_id AS factorId, is_leaf AS isLeaf, sort_order AS sortOrder, description FROM factor_tree ORDER BY sort_order ASC

SELECT definitionid, name, display_name AS displayName, factor_type AS factorType, data_type AS dataType, calc_method AS calcMethod, update_frequency AS updateFrequency, enabled FROM factor_definitions WHERE definitionid = #{definitionid} AND enabled = true
